text.section:
Except as otherwise provided in this title, a person shall be licensed by the Secretary as a private detective agency before the person may:
conduct a business that provides private detective services in the State; and
solicit to engage in a business that provides private detective services in the State.
An individual or a firm may qualify for a license as a private detective agency.
